description:
The Intel DPC++ Compatibility Tool assists in migrating your existing
CUDA code to SYCL code. The tool ports both CUDA language kernels and
library API calls. Typically, 90%-95% of CUDA code automatically
migrates to SYCL code. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using
this software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the software
license agreements at https://intel.ly/393CijO.
